'''Iago Grubb''' was one of [[Frodo]]'s lawyers in ''[[The Return of the Shadow]]'' (at that stage of the writing Frodo was called Bingo). Iago, along with Bingo's other lawyer [[Folco Burrowes]], eject [[Sancho Proudfoot]] as he tries to excavate the pantry at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref name="Shadow">{{RS|1Iiii}}</ref>
